op_long_description: Input reference sequence (file.fa / file.fa.gz)
Another input reference for diploid genome (generated by "pirs diploid", set only when simulating reads of diploid genome)
Input Base-calling profile. (default=$Bin/Profiles/Base-Calling_Profiles/humNew.PE100.matrix.gz)
Input GC content-coverage depth(GC% depth) profile for simulating GC content-coverage bias, the default GC content-coverage bias profile are determined based on the twice of read length
Input InDel-error profile,input InDel-error profile for simulating InDel-error of reads. (default=(exe_path)/Profiles/InDel_Profiles/phixv2.InDel.matrix)
Read length, read1 and read2 are the same length. (default=100)
Sequencing coverage depth. (default=5)
Average insert size. (default=500)
The standard deviation of insert size.(default=5% of average insert size)
Substitution-error rat1e, set the average substitution-error rate(0 or 0.0001~0.63) over all cycles. (default=average substitution-error rate of Base-calling profile)
Simulate reads InDel-error, 0:no, 1:yes. (default=1)
Simulate GC content-coverage bias, 0: no, 1: yes (default=1)
Simulate quality value, 0: no(fasta), 1: yes(fastq) (default=1)
Simulate quality value by Quality-transition mode, 0:no, 1:yes, (default:1)
ASCII shift of quality value, generally 64 or 33 for Illumina data, (default:64)

op_short_description: Mode of read-end masking by EAMSS
op_long_description: Mode of read-end masking by EAMSS algorithm, 0:none, 1:Quality=2, 2:lowercase Base, (default:0)
Cyclize insert fragment (influence on PE reads direction) 0:read1-forward, read2-reverse,                    1: contrary to parameter 0 (default=0)
Output file type, 0: text, 1: gz compressed (default=1)
Output prefix.(default=Illumina)
Output help information and exit.
stdout Records of the program running information.
stderr:
